tool_description: Partial diffusion involves creating novel amino acid sequences by diffusing specific parts of a protein structure while keeping other parts fixed. The input typically includes the target PDB structure and the defined segments to be fixed or diffused, and the output is a new amino acid sequence that maintains the fixed regions while achieving desired modifications in the diffused regions.

required_parameters.name: contigs
required_parameters.description: Defines the contiguous sequence segments for partial diffusion, specifying which parts of the sequence should remain fixed and which parts should be diffused. Example: contigs='A1-10' to keep the first 10 positions fixed and noise the rest. Example: contigs='' to noise the entire sequence. Example: contigs='A' to fix chain A and noise the rest.

required_parameters.name: protein_structure
required_parameters.description: The PDB (Protein Data Bank) identifier of the protein structure used for partial diffusion. It helps determine which parts of the structure to keep fixed or to noise. Example: pdb='6MRR'.

optional_parameters.name: iterations
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the number of iterations for the RF-diffusion.

optional_parameters.name: hotspot
optional_parameters.description: Specifies any hotspot regions that should be prioritized during the backbone generation process.

optional_parameters.name: visual
optional_parameters.description: The type of visualization output, which can be none, a static image, or an interactive display.

optional_parameters.name: num_designs
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the number of generated protein backbone designs.

optional_parameters.name: symmetry
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify symmetry settings, such as automatic detection or cyclic symmetry.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the order of symmetry.

optional_parameters.name: chains
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the protein chains to be processed.

optional_parameters.name: partial_T
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the number of noising steps in the partial diffusion protocol.

optional_parameters.name: use_beta_model
optional_parameters.description: Used to select whether to use the Beta parameter model for better secondary structure element balance.

optional_parameters.name: add_potential
optional_parameters.description: Used to specify the potential to be added to the RF-diffusion.

return_values.name: contigs
return_values.description: Contigs are segments of the protein backbone generated by RFdiffusion, representing specific sequences or portions of the protein's structure, crucial for understanding the formation of secondary and tertiary structures.
